( #{item.partyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.partyType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_party_info SET party_type = #{partyType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_date = #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_date = #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE
AND party_id = #{partyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.sql: a.party_id, a.party_type, a.created_by, a.created_date, a.updated_by, a.updated_date
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_party_info a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.party_id = #{partyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select prr.party_id from t_party_role_rela prr inner join t_sys_role_details srd on prr.role_id = srd.role_id where srd.role_id = #{roleId} group by prr.party_id
